userreviews.userReview: This seems to be the start of a new "arc" in the Blackmoore series. This time around, it feels more urban fantasy conspiracy theory than cozy mystery treasure hunting, and we get to meet more of the paranormal forces - good and bad. It also ties up one or two of the remaining loose ends from the earlier books. It'll be interesting to see where it goes next.

Best one yetThis is my favorite in this series by far, so much action & little, mysterious plot twists. Still a bit of mystery left for the last one though. Really hope we find out more about the cats though but I think I they are probably similar to the dragonfly.

A close callThis one really had me staying up after hours to finish it. Highly recommend this one to everyone. Ms Dobbs isoneof my favorite authors and I am looking forward to reading more of her books

This book was really good. I'm not going to say much about the story except it ended with a very good outcome.
Cozy Lovers - don't miss this series!A fun read with great plot twists, and very likable, engaging characters. A must read with some mystical happenings stirred in!
ExcitingWas surprised that Johanna was alive. Figured right away she did not commit suicide but shocked she was abducted and lived. Look forward to book 6.
Love this "Blackmoore Sisters Mystery" series. Each book adds more elements of mystery as they go along. Definitely going to finish this series!

If your looking for a fun, fast moving book them this is the book for you, and series for that matter. This book is told more from Jolene's point of view, I love that we get to see inside the heads of all the Blackmoore sisters through this series, you delve deeper into their characters with better understanding of them. This story has it all, Jolene is checking into her mother's suicide years ago plus working as a P.I. checking on a client. We have mysterious men popping up and an aunt that appears after being gone for many years. This book keeps moving and keeps you guessing as to what's coming next. Your probably wondering why I didn't give it 5 stars, it's a personal quirk with me but I don't get the secret keeping from the family, it bothers me and it is my quirk and shouldn't bother most because it does add to the mystery and you should not let my it stop you from reading this. I love the Blackmoore sisters and their growing group with their love interests, and will be continuing on with this series, I can't wait to see what comes next.

#5 in Blackmore Sisters Mystery.The Blackmore Sisters and their cat are back! This series has gotten better with each book. The author has slowed her zeal with pairing the sisters off, and concentrated more on the plot and that's A-OK with me! I really liked this story. The paranormal part and the comedy, and just the relationship between the sisters--it's all heartwarming and a nice, relaxing, quick read. This is the kind of story I like to read when I want to be put in a happy place, with a smile on my face. All around enjoyable. I hope Ms. Dobbs continues this series/story, because it's so fun to read. I look forward to more adventures with these sisters. (OK, I know in the past I've said these aren't four star books, but I really enjoyed this one a lot!)Four stars.

This is the fifth book in the Blackmoore Sisters mysteries and with each book the sisters find their "gifts" now referred to as "powers" have grown stronger. This time they discover their powers have increased as they meet their Aunt Eliza for the first time in years and set about to discover what happened to their mother the night she fell off the cliff, coming face to face with someone else with very strong powers. Will they encounter him again?

Definitely hooked on this authorWOW. There was so much going on in this book. It was a great read. It got to the point you couldn't keep track of the good guys and which ones were the bad ones. Just when you thought you had it figured out, they switched sides. As for the ending? I never saw it coming. Can't wait for the next installment of the Blackmoore Sisters Mystery series.

The Return of Aunt ElizaI am totally in love with the Blackmoore Sisters Paranormal books. In this book the girls Aunt Eliza returns for a visit. They haven't seen each other in many years and the girls are curious as to why she would come back now. There is a major twist in this book that I won't spoil for you, but you won't want to miss it! I eagerly await the next book in this series! Thank you Leighann Dobbs!

Final (so far) novel in the Blackmore Sisters series. These five novels were fun to read, and a quick read. However, I was surprised that there wasn't more work on the sisters' part for working on their hidden talents, nor on figuring out what was really going on with the shady sheriff. This novel explains what happened to the mother and it was appropriately written.

This is number 5 in this series and I haven't read the first 4. While there might be some advantage to reading these books in order, it isn't necessary to follow the story. I like that about Ms. Dobbs series of mysteries. I've read 1-4 & 7 in her bakery mysteries and found the same thing. Anyway, back to this book. It was a suspenseful mystery and I will look for more in this series.

I couldn't put this book down!The Blackmore sisters are back and better than ever. Each of them get to shine in this fast paced novel although Jolenene, the youngest sister, really comes to the forefront of the story as her powers grow as does her ability to control them. The twists and turns in the storyline will keep you in the edge of your seat!

Wow, getting a bit unusual for this senior citizen!Moving from mystery and hidden treasures to paranormal, some readers will enjoy.Leighann is an awesome writer, creating full developed characters and mentally visual scenes.I hope for more of her other genre Cozy Mysteries. Preferring mystery, suspense and light romance(non-graphic) stories, Leighann!

Too much paranormal for meThis is a continuation of the Blackmore sisters series. It is a good book with good action but for me it just has way too much hocus pocus. I love the characters and can enjoy a little but for me personally this was too much. I enjoyed the first 4 books.

Awesome! Jolene refuses to believe their mom jumped from the cliff and killed herself. She starts to investigate and stumbles upon more than she wants to. They also learn how to enhance their powers. If you have read the others in the series you must read this one.

BrilliantLeighann keeps getting better and better! The twist and turns are wonderfully done. I can picture the house on the hill. Truly gifted writers Will help you see the story! Well done, well done!

Once againLeighann Dobbs delivers once again. I love the Blackmore sisters and their adventure s are always thrilling .I love that the sisters always have each other's backs. The action is quick and keeps you turning the pages . As always happy reading

Deadly IntentionsDeadly IntentionsI was a little disappointed. Dr.Bly was too much an evil character. Another ghostly cat was a little much. the plot had for me a little too much unreality. There was too much of the same circular characters.
Fascinating read!!This one held more twisted turns than the previous books in this series and kept me engrossed in the intriguing plot all the way to the end .l look forward to the next one.

Who is Eliza Blackmore?Great read! You don't need to read these in order but the flow is a little better having done so. The gang is again in the mist of another take down. They learn more about themselves and their family. The evil guys are trying to take over the world.

We finally get some closure on what happened to the mother. I read the whole book in one setting. It was a good one. I like it when things are resolved. Although it did leave us with some new mysteries.
Getting BetterWhile still not as rich as I think it could have been, it is a bit more complex than the previous four books in the series.I have been enjoying them, and look forward to the next.
Another fun Blackmore sister mystery!The Blackmore girls always seem to find themselves in danger, and this book is no exception. A fun read that follows them on another paranormal adventure!
What a delightful read. It was a lot of fun. It had great characters and fun plot.
loved this one. interested to see where Jolene and Mateo are headed.
Great seriesThis one of the best series I have read in a while. Now, on to the next book. I can't wait to see what is in store for the Blackmoore Sisters and their friends.

description: What really happened to Johanna Blackmoore seven years ago? Jolene Blackmoore has been asking that question about her mother’s mysterious death for a long time ... and now she’s determined to get an answer. Little does she know, her quest will change the course of her and her three sisters' lives forever. A magical locket, a long-estranged aunt that shows up out of the blue, and a diabolical bad guy all play a part in pulling the girls into the heat of danger, and they are forced to put their newly-found paranormal skills to the test in a battle where losing could be deadly. Before it's all over, friends might turn out to be enemies, enemies might turn out to be friends and a long hidden secret about the girls' ancestry will come to light. Will they finally discover the shocking truth of what really happened to their mother?
title:
Deadly Intentions
      
          (Blackmoore Sisters Mystery #5)
